Title: Tech
Presenters: Eric S. Raymond: Ask Me Anything
All Day Event: 'Ask ESR Anything.  What's he been working on? What's he shooting? What's he thinking about? What's he building in there?'

Title: Food
All Day Event: 'Capsicum-based hot sauces are not just about heat- but most people don't think about the other ingredients in their favorite brands.  Not all hot sauces are alike; they fall into distinct groups depending upon their major ingredients (other than hot peppers- vinegar- and water).  Join Eric and Cathy Raymond for a hot sauce tasting experience designed to teach you how to compare your favorites to new ones.  '
